name: Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (June 5)
description: June 2025 preview of Gemini 2.5 Pro introducing adaptive thinking capabilities. Final preview version before stable release, featuring improved control over thinking budget and reasoning depth.
notes: Preview model released June 5, 2025. Introduced adaptive thinking with configurable thinking budget. Users can update to stable 'gemini-2.5-pro' for the same capabilities. Pricing: â‰¤200K input: $1.25/1M prompt, $10/1M completion; >200K input: $2.50/1M prompt, $15/1M completion. This preview became the basis for the stable gemini-2.5-pro release.
